front.title: Common Interface to Cryptographic Modules (CICM) Module Management

abstract.t: [RFC Editor: Please update the RFC references prior to publication.] This memo defines a programming interface for high-level management of cryptographic modules as outlined in draft-lanz-cicm-model-00 and required by draft-lanz-cicm-02 including managing the module authentication, software, logs, built-in tests, and responding to module events. Comments are solicited and should be addressed to the mailing list at cicm@ietf.org.
